tip: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Let me be clear. You are entitled to nothing
Don't find fault, find a remedy; anybody can complain.
Tiger got to hunt, bird got to fly; Man got to sit and wonder 'why, why, why?' Tiger got to sleep, bird got to land; Man got to tell himself he understand.
Nothing that's worthwhile is ever easy.
To be a genius is to be misunderstood. But to be misunderstood is not to be a genius.
To understand the man you have to know what was happening in the world when he was twenty.
The magic you're looking for is in the work you're avoiding.
Once I slow down because I think I have reached my peak, then my skills will go nowhere but down.
As you think, so shall you become.
Do not pray for an easy life. Pray for the strength to endure a difficult one.
No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
God grant me, the Serenity to accept things I cannot change, the Courage to change the things I can, and the Wisdom to know the difference.
We see things not as they are, but as we are.
When you're screwing up, and nobody is saying anything to you anymore, that means they gave up [on you].
The Universe is in no obligation to make sense to you.
The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
[talking about life] We cannot change the cards we are dealth, just how we play the hand.
Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.
The way you spend your days is the way you spend your life.
Once a task is just begun, never leave it till it's done. Be the labour great or small, do it well or not at all.
[...] under-promise and over-deliver.
Do or do not, there is no try.
Everyone you will ever meet, knows something you don't.
